Texts.Eng: A fuel-burning generator. It can generate roughly 10W or higher based on fuel type used. ^blue;Left Input^reset;: Power Switch
Floran not like hot noisssy machine. It makesss BRRRR BRRRRR BRRRR soundss all the time.

Texts.Chs: 原始的利用燃料的方法。但是，它确实有效。
Texts.Eng: Fossil fuel generation. Crass and primitive. It is, however, effective.
I'm not a fan of heavy industry.

Texts.Chs: 它设计有可更换的部件，以减少维修成本。
Texts.Eng: It is designed with replaceable parts to minimize repair costs.
Loud machine is scare. Not like. Why clank and BRRRR? Just make power, no sound!

Texts.Chs: 低阶层的猿族房屋基本都是靠近这类发电机。它发出的恒定的噪音将让你无法安眠。
Texts.Eng: Low-class Apex housing is usually near generators like these. The constant noise prevents you from getting any good sleep.

Texts.Chs: 这将产生很大的能量，但它会消耗燃料。
Texts.Eng: This'll generate a lot of power, but it'll eat up fuel.
